versions.title: 2026-02-16: WebUI Product Surface Refresh, Context Optimizer v2, and LLM Usage/Price Observability
outline: WebUI/product surface refresh: new product API surface + AWS ops/provider pricing/model/chat UI updates
Context optimizer v1/v2 delivered: rule pipelines, budget allocation, context pack/signature/semantic validation
LLM observability expansion: usage events + model pricing persistence with new DB migrations
Desktop packaging updated with product-dist resources and Electron integration path refresh

versions.title: 2026-02-12: Providers Cloud Multi-Config, Governance Trust Gate (Phase 1.8), and Compat Surface Expansion
outline: Governance trust baseline: seeded Phase 1.8 gate requires cross_strong closure with evidence artifacts
Decision timeline hardened: allowlist enums + invariants; stable event semantics for audit linkage
Providers upgrade: local vs cloud split, cloud multi-config UX, model catalog/OpenAI-compatible adapters
Compat/bulk expansion + regenerated WebUI API clients from updated OpenAPI snapshot
New API surfaces: federation + capability dashboard stats, plus tests and E2E updates

versions.title: 2026-02-11: BridgeOS + MCP Expansion, Cloudflare Operations, and Release Hardening
outline: Network Access: Cloudflare MCP discovery + daemon/tunnel operations + logs clear
WebUI UX hardening: bridge profile dialog, setup wizard, global button tooltips, i18n coverage
Release/QA hardening: full regression gates + 3.2.0/3.2.1/3.2.2 stabilization track

versions.title: 2026-02-10: Proactive Work Modes + Transparency
outline: Phase 3: Chat injection pipeline + UI guards (Gate-3, Gate-3.1)
Phase 4: Work/Tasks + safe auto-exec + transparency export (Gate-4)
Rollbacks: inbox_only for injection; work.mode.global for behavior matrix
